headline: How Investors Are Reacting To NextEra Energy (NEE) Deepening Its Google Cloud Data Center Alliance
summary: On December 8, 2025, Google Cloud and NextEra Energy announced an expanded collaboration to co-develop multiple gigawatt-scale data center campuses across the US and deploy Google’s AI and cloud tools to optimize NextEra’s grid operations, maintenance, and digital transformation. This partnership highlights how hyperscale AI demand is increasingly tied to integrated energy-and-technology solutions, positioning utility-scale power providers at the center of future data center infrastructure...
